node.title: SEO Friendly URL's for ASP.NET Core
node.description: An SEO friendly URL is human readable and gives your site a higher page rank. Learn how to implement SEO friendly URL's using ASP.NET Core.

node.title: Dynamically Generating Sitemap.xml for ASP.NET MVC
node.description: How to dynamically generate a sitemap.xml file using ASP.NET MVC to improve the Search Engine Optimization (SEO) of your site and get better search rankings.

node.title: Dynamically Generating Robots.txt Using ASP.NET MVC
node.description: How to dynamically generate a robots.txt file using a simple ASP.NET MVC action method and only a few lines of code.

node.title: Canonical URL's for ASP.NET MVC
node.description: Use canonical URL's in ASP.NET MVC for better Search Engine Optimization (SEO) using ASP.NET Core Boilerplate and the RedirectToCanonicalUrlAttribute.
